de.digitaldevs.npc.core.base

Interface AbstractNPC

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    NPC, NPC, NPC, NPC, NPC, NPC, NPC, NPC, NPC

    public interface AbstractNPC
    This class represents the abstract base of each NPC in this api.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    MerryChrismas, DigitalDevs.de

        void teleport(@NotNull

              boolean onGround)
        The abstract method for teleporting the NPC to a new location.
        Parameters:
        location - the location to witch the NPC should be teleported. Cannot be null.
        onGround - true if the NPC will be standing on a solid ground; false if the NPC will be located somewhere in the sky
        Since:
        1.0
